name: moody

effect.x_y: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

flavor_text.x_y: Raises one stat and lowers another.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises one stat and lowers another.
